siteMetadata.description: A Computer Science graduate student at the University of Rochester.
siteMetadata.about: I am Zichen Wang, a Computer Science master's student studying at the University of Rochester. My study interests are Data Science, Machine Learning, and Software Engineering. Before pursuing my master's degree, I worked as a Software Engineer for about 4 years and mainly focused on Frontend Development. I am preparing myself for becoming a Full Stack Engineer or Machine Learning Engineer in the future. I would love to know about any job opportunities in Software Engineering and Machine Learning. Thanks for your time and have a nice day!ðŸŒŸ
